title: Scallops with raw vegetables, almond satay and ponzu
description: When you need a quick starter, scallops are your go-to option. A light Japanese-style dressing and warm almond satay top them off perfectly.
ingredients: 75ml/2½fl oz dashi stock (instant dashi powder is available from health food shops)
small handful of coriander, finely chopped
4 large scallops, roe separated (with shells for serving, if possible)
